name: NBA ShootOut 2001
overview: For many seasons, 989's NBA ShootOut Series has competed with EA Sports' NBA Live for the position of top basketball game on the PlayStation market. NBA ShootOut 2001 shows no exception to this tradition. NBA ShootOut 2001 features a redesigned game engine that offers improved gameplay and smoother handling of the enhanced graphics offered by this title. To add to the realism, this game features over 400 motion-captured animations and arenas that are based on the actual stadiums that the NBA teams call home. NBA ShootOut 2001 features a refined "Touch Shooting" system that affords players even more control over the finesse shots. More dribbling options and controls are also available in NBA ShootOut 2001. The game is loaded with 450 plays for teams to execute on the hardwood. AI is also improved, allowing the computer defense to adjust to a particular style of offense, or for the computer's offense to choose a style that exploits weaknesses in the current method of defense. Features: Select your strategy from a playbook that includes over 450 different moves Featuring play-by-play commentary from Ian Eagle Play on the hardwood of arenas that are based on real-life basketball stadiums
